summary: Adds Chillrend Armor to the game. Set is fully enchanted and is located in a cave near Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
I saw a request for this once in a comments section and really liked the idea. I finally got around to making it. All of the details are in the images so I don't believe any information is required.

Includes:
Chillrend: Full armor set with Bow and Dagger.
Chill-Wind Cave: New cave Southeast of Ivarstead complete with enemies.


Installation:
Files have been archived. Simply drop the ChillrendArmor.esp and ChillrendArmor.bsa into your data folder or use the NMM.

Change Note:
If for some odd reason the mannequin doesn't work (it seems to work for some including myself) then get version 1.1 where the armor is added to the chest as well.
author: Hearton

files.name: Failsafe - Armor is added to chest as well
